title: Plat+ Mid, ADC and Support required for serious ranked 5's team
body:
Very experienced Top and Jungle wanting to recruit players for a serious ranked 5's team (Mid, ADC and Support). We will practice most nights and be entering tournaments. You will need to have ranked 5's experience, including map awareness, good communication, decent champ pool (at least current meta champs for your lane) and the ability to provide and receive constructive criticism. 

I am aware that a lot of players after reset can get stuck in gold or plat and it may not be a good determination of your skill level, but a minimum level ensures at least a baseline skill level. However, your skill will be judged in game and not solely on your rank (I have played with many bad diamonds and some really good golds).

You will also need to main the lane your wanting to play, i.e. play that role most of the time in solo q or ranked 5's. Have Skype and a good mic. 

If your interested add me in game for a trial.

Cheers

replies.body:
Hey Ho4x3r,

I'm interested in trying out as a mid laner for your ranked 5s team.

 - Champion pool: {{champion:101}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:4}} 
 - Plat V in Soloq
 - Plat I in Ranked 5s
 - Available most nights

I also have a mate who mains ADC who I've teamed with before. He's a God.

 - My IGN: Fraggin
 - My friends: Deathsticks

We're both very keen on ranked 5s and have a decent amount of experience.

Cheers

Previously **Platinum I **in Season 5, and also have a plat V smurf, I also used to coach League on LoLCoaching, so shotcalling is something I am alright at, but I'm more of a lane analysis guy.
When I play ranked I generally play mid or sup.

I have wide champion pool, and am always open to picking up new champions in order to work with the team's strategy.
**My Mid champions include **
Jayce Anivia
Leblanc Katarina
Ziggs Ahri
Syndra Xerath

**My support champions include**
Thresh                   Janna
Annie                     Zyra
Leona
Blitzcrank
Morgana
I don't rage at all, in fact I have never gotten a chat restriction or anything like that. My timezone is ACST (Adelaide time), i'm not sure what timezone your team is, but I'm sure we could work things out :3 .
I also have Skype, Mumble and could download Teamspeak if necessary.
If you're interested, add me on my main: **Blizzard9789**
Interested, I mostly play mid; Katarina especially, but I'm more than to happy to do what is needed. Gold I S4, Gold 2 atm.
interested, i mostly play top and adapt to any team comp. diam+ s3 s4
